strings.evolution:
This is what it's like to be awakened?
This is quite brilliant for old sorcery.
strings.affinity:
It seems you believe in my research,
even with this temporary body.
I look forward to further studies.
strings.description: A former pupil of Mysidia with the ability to strengthen organic bodies by transferring magical power into them. Although Heltich's original intentions were to grant power to the weak, his research lead to the birth of dangerous beasts that subsequently caused his expulsion from Mysidia. Later he would meet a young woman with berserker abilities who helped him gain new insight.
strings.fusion:
A technique that can make anyone stronger.
The ancients held some truly precious talents.
strings.summon:
The techniques of visions...
Is it possible I could make that
legendary magic power my own?

strings.evolution:
More power from the visions, I see.
This will surely aid in my research.
strings.affinity:
It seems you believe in my research,
even with this temporary body.
I look forward to further studies.
strings.description: A man who sought to give the talentless and weak an opportunity to gain their own power through his abilities. Hating human sacrifices, Heltich decided to carry out his experimental spells on animals, resulting in the birth of various beasts. The infamy he gained from this lead to his exile from Mysidia, although he never lost sight of his objective. Currently he studies the nature of berserkers to the same end.
strings.fusion:
The more power you have,
the more you'll end up wanting.
This must be what the elders feared.
strings.summon:
My research showed it was possible, but...
I have become of one those
legendary visions.

strings.affinity:
It seems you believe in my research,
even with this temporary body.
I look forward to further studies.
strings.description: An apprentice of black magic who once studied in Mysidia. Heltich is a proficient mage who used spells from an ancient tome he inherited to transfer magical power into organic bodies in hopes of strengthening them. His attempts lead to the birth of a beast, and instead of being frightened by the results, this incited him to create even more of them. These events ultimately lead to his expulsion from Mysidia by Sakura and her cohorts.
strings.fusion:
I can feel magic coming in from outside.
If only I had such a power.
strings.summon:
What are these...visions?
Could this body be capable of
the power I've been after?
